alert.note: Alert for Big Island North; Big Island South; Big Island Southeast; Kahoolawe; Kohala; Lanai Leeward; Lanai Mauka; Lanai Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Central Valley South; Maui Leeward West; Maui Windward West; South Haleakala; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued August 10 at 3:20PM HST until August 10 at 10:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM THIS EVENING FOR PORTIONS OF MAUI COUNTY AND THE BIG ISLAND... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast to east winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts near 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of the Big Island, Maui, Lanai and Kahoolawe. * WHEN...Until 10 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can knock down tree branches, blow away tents and unsecured objects, and make it difficult to drive, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure, or take them down. Be prepared for localized power outages.
